top_items.author: @AlexFinn

title.en-US: 210 hours OpenClaw usage in a month, comprehensive video with lessons on setup, VPS, security
title.zh-CN: 一个月内使用OpenClaw超过210小时，发布涵盖设置、VPS问题、安全等的完整视频教程，自称比地球上任何人都用得多

summary.en-US: OpenClaw深度使用经验 + 教程 + 安全
summary.zh-CN: 超高收藏量（1116），210小时深度使用总结，触及安全、VPS等进阶话题，是「建系统」的实战手册

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw深度使用经验 + 教程 + 安全
top_items.suggested_angle: 这是「建系统」的实战手册——210小时不是使用，是 stress test。VPS vs 本地、安全边界、用例分类，这些才是Agent基础设施的真问题。

js_take.en-US: 210 hours isn't usage, it's a stress test. VPS vs local, security boundaries, use case taxonomy—these are the real Agent infrastructure problems. Building systems, not demos.
js_take.zh-CN: 210 hours isn't usage, it's a stress test. VPS vs local, security boundaries, use case taxonomy—these are the real Agent infrastructure problems. Building systems, not demos.

top_items.author: @rileybrown

title.en-US: OpenClaw accessing Blender, Cinema 4D, After Effects, Figma
title.zh-CN: 展示OpenClaw接入Blender、C4D、AE、Figma等创意工具后的强大能力。

summary.en-US: OpenClaw创意工具集成、Agent能力边界扩展
summary.zh-CN: 超高互动(634赞)展示OpenClaw在创意生产管道的实际应用，完美体现"表/里世界"框架——创意工具正从App退化为Agent可调用的能力。

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw创意工具集成、Agent能力边界扩展
top_items.suggested_angle: The surface world of creative software is becoming infrastructure for the inner world. When agents can orchestrate Blender, Cinema 4D, and Figma in a single workflow, the tool fades and intent takes over. This is the migration from GUI to agent-native computing.

js_take.en-US: This is the shift from GUI-native to agent-native. Creative tools becoming APIs that agents orchestrate. The interface fades when intent becomes the interface.
js_take.zh-CN: This is the shift from GUI-native to agent-native. Creative tools becoming APIs that agents orchestrate. The interface fades when intent becomes the interface.

top_items.author: @heyshrutimishra

title.en-US: 700 million Chinese users can deploy AI agents via Baidu search bar, OpenClaw through Baidu AI Cloud
title.zh-CN: 7亿中国用户现在可以通过百度搜索栏部署AI Agent，百度AI云支持OpenClaw一键部署，无需终端、Docker或开发环境

summary.en-US: OpenClaw + Baidu + 中国市场大规模部署
summary.zh-CN: 触及OpenClaw进入中国市场的重要节点，7亿用户无门槛部署是「里世界」普及的关键一步

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw + Baidu + 中国市场大规模部署
top_items.suggested_angle: 这是「里世界」的中国加速度——7亿用户从搜索栏部署Agent，不是技术进步，是入口革命。当部署门槛降到零，人群分化将彻底加速。

js_take.en-US: Inner world's China acceleration—700M users deploying Agents from search bar. Not tech progress, entry point revolution. When deployment hits zero friction, demographic divergence goes supersonic.
js_take.zh-CN: Inner world's China acceleration—700M users deploying Agents from search bar. Not tech progress, entry point revolution. When deployment hits zero friction, demographic divergence goes supersonic.
